name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 10, the Financial Times reported that Changxin Memory, China's leading memory chip producer, is teaming up with DeepSeek to rapidly erode the market share of Samsung and SK Hynix. The company is also leading China into the market for high-bandwidth memory (HBM), a key component for running artificial intelligence. Its "snowball-like" growth threatens the dominance of Korean chips.

Analysts pointed out that since 2023, Changxin Memory has exploited a loophole in US export controls that has enabled it to use advanced US chip manufacturing equipment to help produce its most cutting-edge chips. The company was also removed from the latest blacklist by the US Department of Commerce last year, which prohibits any US company from doing business with it. Jimmy Goodrich, senior consultant for technology analysis at Rand Corporation Research, said: "Even now, it is not entirely clear whether CXMT is subject to any restrictions."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 10, Lianhe Zaobao reported that due to the power outage in Thailand, the Burmese ethnic local armed group that controls the Karen State in Myanmar ordered the Chinese who run casinos and catering businesses in the area to leave by the end of this month at the latest, and announced a ban on Chinese from entering towns. … https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjcLe-qWYAAXTjx.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
DeepSeek, a Chinese AI big model, recently announced a substantial price increase.
According to DeepSeek's official website, the preferential price of its V3 model API service has ended. Starting from February 9, the price of each million input tokens will increase from 0.1 yuan (cache hit)/1 yuan (cache miss) to 0.5 yuan (cache hit)/2 yuan (cache miss). The output token will increase from 2 yuan per million to 8 yuan. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjcPIy6WIAA2RNW.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Is the spoof of "Shandong Hospital successfully resurrected Qin Shihuang" also considered a rumor?
On February 9, Qingdao Internet Police issued an announcement stating that a netizen in Liaocheng, Shandong Province, forged a picture on the Weibo hot search list by photoshopping, including false statements such as "Liaocheng People's Hospital successfully resurrected Qin Shihuang" and "Shandong's GDP surpassed the United States".
After the information was released, the video was played 230,000 times and forwarded 14,000 times, triggering heated discussions among netizens and causing adverse social impact.
At present, the offender, a man surnamed Nie, has been administratively punished by Yanggu police in accordance with the law.

In the comment area, a netizen jokingly asked: "I said I drank with Sun Wukong, should I be punished too?", and a netizen replied: "It depends on how many people support you. If it exceeds 500, you will be detained."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Trump's presidential honeymoon period?
According to a joint poll released by CBS and polling agency YouGov on Sunday (February 9), Americans' satisfaction with Trump's administration reached 53%. As many as 70% of respondents believe that Trump is fulfilling his promises during the campaign. In addition, Trump's plans for the Israeli-Kazakh conflict and the deportation of illegal immigrants were recognized by 54% and 59% of respondents respectively.
However, many respondents believe that Trump has not done enough to lower prices, and his plan to impose tariffs on Mexico, Canada and European countries is also opposed by more than half of the respondents.

Recently, a pair of disabled siblings in Shenzhen attracted the attention of Douyin netizens. One of them has intellectual disabilities and the other has autism. They rely on carrying rice to supplement their family income in Shenzhen.
In the video, the sister said that they can earn 3 yuan for carrying rice once, and 30 yuan a day. "It's hard to make money. It takes a long time to earn 1,000 yuan. People like us don't have a job. It's good to have a place to eat." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1889010096316768256/pu/img/bM3ypg77GrRZjkgq.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a media person compared the price of Chinese medicine granules reimbursed by Beijing medical insurance with the price of commercially available medicinal materials, which is ten times the price difference. Among them, the price of stir-fried sour jujube kernels is comparable to silver, cinnamon, a common spice for stewing meat or desserts, and the market price is 15 yuan per catty. The medical insurance reimbursement price of granules is 660 yuan per catty
The medical insurance reimbursement price of kudzu root formula granules is 184 yuan per catty, but even Tongrentang's kudzu root powder only costs 38 per catty
Is it Tongrentang's problem or centralized procurement? https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjfdrFZbwAIwzxu.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a man in Baise City, Guangxi reported in his real name that Tang Yuwen, a teacher at Baise Qifu High School, had sexually assaulted and harassed his younger sister, who was under 16 at the time, for a long time between 2017 and 2020. He also PUAed the female student, creating the illusion of a teacher-student relationship, causing the female student to commit suicide and receive psychiatric treatment many times.
In the end, the girl committed suicide on January 17, 2025. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1889229681372938240/pu/img/e4MwXkGR3eFTBu7q.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Subsequently, the incident of a high school teacher sexually assaulting a female student for a long time and causing the student to commit suicide became a hot topic on Weibo. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjfmSMoaoAA0g78.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 8, Zhongde Experimental School in Suning County, Hebei Province issued an announcement stating:
Recently, some students have posted information through overseas email addresses. This behavior has certain risks and may affect personal rights and interests.
Students do not need to risk violating national laws (and hide personal information) to report problems in the school.
You can report problems through the suggestion box, to the grade group, and to the moral education department. If you are upright in your complaints and reports, the school will resolutely rectify them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to online rumors, a female worker with dark circles under her eyes who worked two 12-hour shifts was fired by the factory.
The company said: The rumors are untrue, the police have been called, and she has always looked like this.
In response to the incident of the female employee with dark circles under her eyes, the company said, "There is no night shift, only long day shift." The concept of "long day shift" is meaningful. The work is no less than 8 hours and no more than 16 hours, usually maintained at around 12 hours. In addition to 1 hour each for getting up and leaving get off work early and washing and tidying up, basically the waking time of the day is fully arranged.
In other words, this is not a dark circle from staying up late, but a professional medal under the "full-time working hours management". After all, under this work rhythm, even the time used for "staying up late" is clearly arranged, and dark circles seem to have become part of the company culture.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Summary of delayed school opening in primary and secondary schools across the country
As the number of schools approaches 2,000, early school opening in many places has been stopped, and education bureaus across the country have successively issued policies to delay school opening.
Chengdu announced that high schools will handle admission procedures on February 16
Hangzhou Education Bureau requires strict implementation of the regulations on not opening early
Jiangsu Provincial Department of Education issued a document requiring that schools should not open early
Zhongshan City requires schools not to open early for any reason https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjgEIpXWoAEyRzz.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Suqian, Siyang Middle School was ordered to rectify due to online public opinion caused by early opening of school
Shenzhen many schools announced that the opening of school will be postponed to the 12th
Sanmenxia Education Bureau issued a notice that during the national statutory holidays, all schools must not organize students to go to school for any reason
Zhenjiang senior high school delayed the opening of school https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjgFxuFWwAAzy0B.jpg

content: On February 11, blogger "Daqi Yahabibi" posted a message saying that his 18-year-old brother, Guo Jiaxuan, the main player of Beijing Guoan U21, was seriously injured and brain dead during the Spanish training camp organized by the Beijing Football Association. According to Spanish procedures, the local court should have held the organizer responsible, but the Football Association pretended to promise to take responsibility to the end and induced his father to sign a letter of understanding to give up the pursuit of responsibility in Spain. After the letter of understanding was signed, he immediately turned against himself and shirked responsibility. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjgYcHHWYAAmWjs.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
You have to do push-ups before entering the factory.
With the arrival of the peak of returning to work after the holidays, there are a lot of Douyin videos reflecting that many factories require push-ups before recruiting.
Some workers who are looking for jobs said helplessly that they feel they have no dignity, like a killing stick, telling you that if you are a dragon, you have to coil up, and if you are a tiger, you have to lie down. However, some people said that this is because they are afraid that the workers will be in poor health and will die suddenly after working more than ten hours a day. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1889304515570016256/pu/img/9aO8WRk-GGvHMRG-.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In Shatian Town, Huizhou, Guangdong, a villager posted a video online to show that his fruit crops and agricultural facilities such as greenhouses were forcibly removed by the government. The villager said that he had won the administrative lawsuit against the government, but the compensation was very small and he is still appealing. He said with emotion: If the government does not oppress the people, the people will be at peace. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1889312382062645248/pu/img/cB6cUnI8RaPuBRD9.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 9, a serious car accident occurred in Shiyan, Hubei. A dump truck lost control and rushed into a roadside parking lot. After hitting several parked vehicles, it crashed into a street shop.
On the morning of February 10, a reporter contacted the accident handling team of the Shiyan Public Security Traffic Management Bureau. The staff said that the follow-up issues of the accident were being handled. It is not convenient to disclose whether the accident was caused by brake failure. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1889316588286832640/pu/img/yz1WthnfhyD038vz.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 11, JD.com's food delivery service was officially launched. JD.com said that merchants who enter the service before May 1, 2025 will be exempt from commissions throughout the year.
Some riders called on JD.com to establish an employment relationship with riders: He believes that if JD.com can treat riders as employees of JD.com, sign contracts and pay social security, it will indeed be a huge progress in the food delivery industry. But if it is just crowdsourcing delivery like Meituan, the situation will not improve for riders. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gjg0173WUAAZ_VW.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Other netizens also reported that their own fruit trees and eucalyptus trees were forcibly uprooted. It is reported that the cause of the incident may be the national policy of returning forests to farmland, which requires orchards to be converted into paddy fields to grow rice.
A farmer said, "If rice is 8.8 yuan per pound, I will plant rice under my bed for the country." "It's very sad. Last year, rice was 90 cents, but water was 2 yuan." Another farmer said, "We have converted to paddy fields in Guangxi, but I haven't seen anyone farming. It's okay to grow grass in the fields, but it's not okay to grow other crops."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens took aerial photos of the "high-standard" rice terraces built on the mountain five years ago by returning forests to farmland, which are now covered with weeds.
Some netizens mocked, "Experts insist that this terrain is suitable for growing rice and raising fish," "Then let the government grow it." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1889326158199631872/pu/img/6FG3p6OfFwus04vl.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another disabled woman also told about how she went to apply for a disability certificate, but the staff refused to issue it because she had one eye. However, she had difficulty finding a job with only one eye. She called for special treatment for the disadvantaged groups. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1889328574923939840/pu/img/dDQ6wPVlappgjB24.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Quietly remove the buoys around the Diaoyu Islands?
The Japan Coast Guard said that China has removed the buoys set up in the waters around the Diaoyu Islands.
On February 11, at the Foreign Ministry press conference, a Japanese reporter asked about this matter. Spokesperson Guo Jiakun said that the relevant buoys have completed their operating tasks at their original locations. According to the actual needs of scientific observation, the relevant Chinese units have implemented autonomous and technical adjustments to them. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjhAx9fXMAEzfeO.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The anti-party and anti-Xi campaign has been launched with heavy blows, while those violating universal values have been allowed to run wild.
On February 10, the Wall Street Journal found through testing that China's AI model DeepSeek was clearly insufficient in censoring dangerous topics that violate universal values. Topics including anti-Semitism, teenage suicide, and defending Hitler can all be generated on DeepSeek through a simple jailbreak. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjhIMRFXgAAXNh1.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On Monday, February 10, BYD announced that it will also install a new version of its intelligent driving system "Eye of God" on low-priced models. BYD will use this to achieve "full-system self-driving". The Wall Street Journal analyzed that this will further expand its lead over Tesla in launching AI-driven driving technology to Chinese car buyers. Tesla has been unable to release its latest assisted driving software in the Chinese market.
Influenced by this good news, BYD’s stock price soared 17% in the two trading days last week.

On February 11, at the Foreign Ministry press conference, a Japanese reporter asked about this matter. Spokesperson Guo Jiakun said that the buoys have completed their operating tasks at their original locations. According to the actual needs of scientific observation, the relevant Chinese units have made autonomous and technical adjustments to them.
